statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir_display=$(echo "${cwd/#$HOME/\~}" | awk -F/ '{if (NF > 8) {printf "…/"; for(i=NF-7;i<=NF;i++) printf "%s%s", $i, (i<NF?"/":""); print ""} else print}'); output="$dir_display"; if cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -c gc.auto=0 symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$branch" ] && output="$output on $branch"; fi; if command -v kubectl &> /dev/null; then k8s_context=$(kubectl config current-context 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$k8s_context" ]; then k8s_namespace=$(kubectl config view --minify --output 'jsonpath={..namespace}' 2>/dev/null); k8s_namespace=${k8s_namespace:-default}; output="$output (☸ $k8s_context:$k8s_namespace)"; fi; fi; [ -n "$AWS_PROFILE" ] && output="$output (☁️  $AWS_PROFILE)"; echo "$output"
